result.title: How to write Contributing blogs/comments
result.content:
Before downvoting this entry, I would like to ask for all to read this entry and provide some advice.

I have noticed that I have spent quality time writing up blogs (they are deleted now because of downvotes), but people do not seem to appreciate them. I am pretty sure that many other users face this same issue, where they would always get downvotes even when they are trying to help.

May I ask for advice on: -how to write blogs that people would upvote on -how to write good comments

Looking forward to any feedback
